PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Ansco Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Mr. John D. Grace, 129 Enterprise Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 8, 1958, pg. 2 with question: "Should jitney drivers be licensed and permitted to operate, or should they be jailed?" answer reads: "My opinion is that they should be licensed to drive, because most of the time you cannot get a cab."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of John D. Grace wearing light colored fedora and dark overcoat, standing in front of marble wall between store windows with display and sign that reads "Neckwear 1/2 off All Sales Final"
